body: A soul can't be returned to life if it doesn't wish to be. A soul knows the name, alignment, and patron deity (if any) of the character attempting to revive it and may refuse to return on that basis.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Casting Spells/Special Spell Effects/Bringing Back the Dead/Revivification against Ones Will
name: Revivification against One's Will
